DiceRollerPD_2

Class DiceBag

  • java.lang.Object
    • DiceRollerPD_2.DiceBag

  • public class DiceBag
extends java.lang.Object
    DiceBag is a Class that represents a collection of Die that have the same number of faces.
    Author:
    Blaise Mahoro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DiceBag(int numberOfDice, int numberOfFaces)
      DiceBag constructor calls setNumberOfDice to initializes the number of dice.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Die[] getDice()
      getDice returns all dice in form of an array
      int getNumberOfDice()
      getNumberOfDice returns the number of Dice.
      int getNumberOfFaces()
      getNumberOfFaces returns the number of faces
      int getTotal()
      getTotal returns the total of all faces rolled.
      int roll()
      roll: goes through the array of Dice and rolls each die .
      void setNumberOfDice(int numberOfDice)
      setNumberOfDice sets the number of Dice.
      void setTotal()
      setTotal goes through the array of dice, calculates and sets the total.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiceBag

        public DiceBag(int numberOfDice,
               int numberOfFaces)
        throws NumberOfFacesRangeException,
               NumberOfDiceRangeException
        DiceBag constructor calls setNumberOfDice to initializes the number of dice. and calls Die constructor to initialize each die
        Parameters:
        numberOfDice - for the number of dice in the bag.
        numberOfFaces - for the number of faces on each die.
        Throws:
        NumberOfFacesRangeException - -if the number of faces is less than 0
        NumberOfDiceRangeException - -if the number of Dice is less than 0.

        getNumberOfDice returns the number of Dice.

        public int getNumberOfFaces()
        getNumberOfFaces returns the number of faces

      • getTotal

        public int getTotal()
        getTotal returns the total of all faces rolled.
        Returns:
        total

      • getDice

        public Die[] getDice()
        getDice returns all dice in form of an array
        Returns:
        dice

      • setNumberOfDice

        public void setNumberOfDice(int numberOfDice)
                     throws NumberOfDiceRangeException
        setNumberOfDice sets the number of Dice.
        Parameters:
        numberOfDice - for the number of Dice
        Throws:
        NumberOfDiceRangeException - -if the number of Dice is less than 0.

      • setTotal

        public void setTotal()
        setTotal goes through the array of dice, calculates and sets the total.

      • roll

        public int roll()
        roll: goes through the array of Dice and rolls each die . It also calculates the total.
        Returns:
        total
